description: This file defines an interface `IGuide` for a guide component in a media or broadcast framework, including nested notification interface and various virtual methods for guide operations.

classes.name: IGuide
classes.description: Interface providing access to guide functionalities including channel information, program info, parental controls, and notifications.

classes.name: IGuide::INotification
classes.description: Notification interface for guide events such as broadcast updates, alerts, and parental control changes.

methods.name: StartParser
methods.description: Starts the guide parser with a given shell interface.

methods.name: GetChannels
methods.description: Retrieves a string representing available channels.

methods.name: GetPrograms
methods.description: Retrieves a string representing available programs.

methods.name: GetCurrentProgram
methods.description: Retrieves the current program for a specific channel.

methods.name: GetAudioLanguages
methods.description: Retrieves available audio languages for a given program.

methods.name: GetSubtitleLanguages
methods.description: Retrieves available subtitle languages for a given program.

methods.name: SetParentalControl
methods.description: Enables or disables parental control for a specific setting.

methods.name: IsParentalControlled
methods.description: Checks if parental control is currently enabled.

methods.name: SetParentalLock
methods.description: Locks or unlocks content based on parental lock settings.

methods.name: IsParentalLocked
methods.description: Checks if content is currently locked.

ctags.name: IGuide
ctags.pattern: /^    struct EXTERNAL IGuide : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/

ctags.name: INotification
ctags.pattern: /^        struct EXTERNAL INotification : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/
